EmailTemplate.name: Email when opp stage changed from enrollment pending to onboarding
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Account.Name} from NCM 20 Group {!Opportunity.NCM_20_Group_Code__c} has moved into Onboarding status
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello Onboarding,
{!Account.Name} from NCM 20 Group {!Opportunity.NCM_20_Group_Code__c} has moved into Onboarding status.
Opportunity record link:{!Opportunity.Link}
Thanks
NCM Support
NCMSupport@foundationdirect.com
